Interface UserService

public interface UserService
Service class that handles users and registration

  • Method Details

    • registerNewUser

      boolean registerNewUser(@NotNull @NotNull RegisterFormDto registerFormDto)
      Register a new user
      Parameters:
      registerFormDto - The payload
      Returns:
      True if the user has been created, false if email and/or username is already taken

    • getByFilter

      @NotNull @NotNull org.springframework.data.domain.Page<UserDto> getByFilter(int pageNumber, @Nullable @Nullable String username)
      Get a page of users by page. If the username is null, no filter regarding username is done. Otherwise, the query will be filtered using 'LIKE %username%'
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - The page number
      username - The username to filter, if not null
      Returns:
      A page of filtered users

    • disable

      boolean disable(long userId)
      Disable a user by its ID
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID
      Returns:
      True if disabled, false otherwise

    • enable

      boolean enable(long userId)
      Enable a user by its ID
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID
      Returns:
      True if enabled, false otherwise

    • resetPassword

      boolean resetPassword(long userId)
      Reset user's password by its ID. The password is generated from the system and sent via email or displayed in some ways
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID
      Returns:
      True if success, false otherwise

    • updateAuthorities

      boolean updateAuthorities(long userId, @NotNull @NotNull List<String> authorities)
      Override user's authorities by its id and new authorities
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID
      authorities - The new authorities
      Returns:
      True if authorities override success, false otherwise

    • changePassword

      Change password for the current logged user
      Parameters:
      dto - The old and new password
      Returns:
